DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , single-arm , multicenter , multiple single-dose intravenous ( IV ) infusion , efficacy , safety extension study Phase 1 Study CT-P13 1.1 design assess long-term efficacy safety multiple dose CT-P13 .
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study Demonstrate Equivalence Long-Term Efficacy Safety CT-P13 Patients With Ankylosing Spondylitis Who Were Treated With Infliximab ( Remicade CT-P13 ) Study CT-P13 1.1
